The International Civil Service Effectiveness (InCiSE) project is a
benchmarking and peer learning project based at the
[Blavatnik School of Government](https://www.bsg.ox.ac.uk/incise).

:::{.grid}
:::{.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4}
## InCiSE in 2024 and beyond
Building on the foundations created by the 2017 and 2019 editions
of the InCiSE Index, the School is re-establishing the project and aims to
release a new edition of the Index in 2024. Alongside a new edition of the
Index we will also be consulting stakeholders to review the conceptual
framework behind the Index to ensure it is fit for the future. [Read more](incise2024.qmd).
:::
:::{.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4}
